column4: Port? I thought ethtool just confiured some interface settings
hm I remember that it uses a port which I can send the magic package to
but you dont just put things in there.. you make a proper upstart script for things
you can set the bios to boot the other hd
Bios boots HDD#2 with Ubuntu, but Ubuntu does not recognize Windows7 also it does not show WIndows7 HDD in its file manager
i edit the config in /etc/grub/  to use whatever file i want.
it used to have a image setting or lines in there.

I read that config but it is build with if loops, like if it does not find that image it will use in the end the standard ubuntu desktop wallpaper. so I would not know where to insert the filepath for my wallpaper..
i change the code. or copy my image to wheres it is looking
Only information I have is that I have to put my image into boot/grub*/ but that does not work
What should I change in the file you named?
im on my phone so cant look. i dont recall it being too hard. i think the ubuntu grub pages have info on it
